root.name: Adventure Pinball: Forgotten Island
root.description: OverviewAdventure Pinball: Forgotten Island is a pinball game developed by Digital Extremes and published by Electronic Arts (Sold Out Sales Marketing in the UK) for the PC platform.GameplayIn Adventure Pinball: Forgotten Island there are a total of nine tables, but rather than them being individual tables they are all connected. The connected tables are to give the game more of an adventure feel. In order to advance to another table there are a set amount of goals on the current one to complete.Unlike most pinball games which show the entire or most of the pinball table, Forgotten Island uses a more zoomed in view which will follow the ball around.
